alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Franklin; Southern Worcester; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 27 at 3:24PM EST until January 29 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Franklin, Central Middlesex, Western Essex and Southern Worcester Counties. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow accumulations in this region are more uncertain than in the high terrain. This is because of marginal temperatures and the potential for the snow to mix with or change to rain for a time on Sunday into Sunday evening.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Franklin; Southern Worcester; Western Essex
